H0.text: What were the first names of US television cartoonists Hanna and Barbera. Robert and Richard

H1.text: What were the first names of US television cartoonists Hanna and Barbera. Michael and David

H2.text: What were the first names of US television cartoonists Hanna and Barbera. Thomas and James

H3.text: What were the first names of US television cartoonists Hanna and Barbera. William and Joseph

A4.text: Joseph Roland Barbera ( bar-BAIR-ə; Italian: [barˈbɛːra]; March 24, 1911 – December 18, 2006) was an American animator and cartoonist. He co-founded the animation studio Hanna-Barbera alongside William Hanna.
